description.en: Learn to use 'How long?' correctly with Present Perfect for ongoing actions and Past Simple for completed actions. Master the natural English way to ask about duration.
description.es: Aprende a usar 'How long?' correctamente con Present Perfect para acciones continuas y Past Simple para acciones completadas. Domina la forma natural inglesa de preguntar sobre duración.

prompt.en: How long have you lived in Spain?

exercises.solution: How long have you lived in Spain?

tip.en: Use 'How long?' (not 'How much time?') for duration questions. With Present Perfect for actions that started in the past and continue to the present.
tip.es: Usa 'How long?' (no 'How much time?') para preguntas de duración. Con Present Perfect para acciones que empezaron en el pasado y continúan en el presente.

prompt.en: How long did the meeting last this morning?
prompt.es: ¿Cuánto tiempo duró la reunión de esta mañana?

exercises.solution: How long did the meeting last this morning?

tip.en: Use Past Simple for completed actions in a closed time period. The verb 'last' means 'durar'. The meeting is finished, so we use past tense.
tip.es: Usa Past Simple para acciones completadas en un período de tiempo cerrado. El verbo 'last' significa 'durar'. La reunión terminó, así que usamos pasado.
